title: [Large-Scale] Malay Language Learning Program for Dyslexic Children Using a Multisensory Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Recognition of Basic Malay Alphabet and Word Comprehension
context.additional_context: Enhancing Malay language reading and writing skills for dyslexic children through smartphone-based digital-physical integrated learning activities.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately pronounce 50 Malay words through multisensory activities (visual, auditory, tactile)
Learners can construct 10 Malay sentences using digital-physical interaction tools
Learners demonstrate a 30% improvement in phonological awareness through formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
